The Cat Therapist

Is your cat showing signs of depression?

Are they dealing with anxieties that you cannot explain?

Then you have come to the right place!

Here at The Cat Therapist, we make your cat's mental wellbeing the utmost importance. We are devoted to keeping your feline friends the happiest they can be!

Testimonials

Cherry

Cherry was suffering with really bad anxiety which we found out was due to a change in her home environment.

Learn more here
Greybeard

Greybeard suddenly started to have bad toilet habits and was no longer using his litter box as he had done in the past. We found out this was a new cat roaming the streets around his home thanks to The Cat Therapist

Learn more here
Tabby

Tabby was suffering from really low mood and disinterest in playing and doing anything, we worked with her and she is now much happier.
